Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its exceptional value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $10800 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, taking into account the high worth of the product to both of us. Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
